description: Contact responsible for contributing to the creation of the digital object. Also referred to as an "author", "contributor", "originator".
Contact responsible for creating the TDIS metadata record describing the digital object.
Contact responsible for uploading or transferring the digital object to TDIS.
Contact responsible for the quality, completeness, and formatting of the digital object and its metadata to enable reuse.
Contact responsible for updating and maintaining versions of the digital object when content changes, often used for software.
Contact responsible for ensuring appropriate long-term stewardship of the digital object in terms of storage and access.
Contact controlling copyrights or other intellectual property rights over the digital object, responsible for determining licenses.
Contact with another role or responsibility toward the digital object.
